item.description:
I havent been to this place since the new deck area opened.
it's a small local place but with a good beer selection.

You can get there by hopping on the Green Line (B-Harvard Ave stop and walk a bit) or 66 bus goes right by this place as well.

I'll try to get a table of some sort outside, but we can always just sit inside too. Either way it should be a good times :)


Yelp review
Deep Ellum menu
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sun or call (will post my number)
item.name: Happy Hour
